A graph is a pair <math>G = (V, E)</math> where <math>V</math> is a set whose elements are called vertices and <math>E \subseteq V \times V</math> a set whose elements are called edges.

When <math>(x,y) \in E</math> we will write <math> x \mathrel{\bullet  \! {-} \! \bullet} y</math>
